original_text: Even all that the Lord hath commanded you by the hand of Moses, from the day that the Lord commanded Moses, and henceforward among your generations;
korean_text: 곧 여호와께서 모세를 통하여 너희에게 명령한 모든 것을 여호와께서 명령한 날 이후부터 너희 대대에 지키지 못하여

sentences.original_text: Even all that the Lord hath commanded you
from the day that the Lord commanded Moses
